mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT name from user where uuid=brb.uuid ) as name FROM book_request_board brb LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
mapper.update: UPDATE book_request_board set brd_comment = #{brd_comment}, bk_category = #{bk_category}, brb_title = #{brb_title}, brb_price = #{brb_price} WHERE brb_id = #{brb_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_request_board_reply (brbr_regdate, uuid, uuid_book_url, brb_id) VALUE (now(), #{uuid}, #{uuid_book_url}, #{brb_id});
